snippet: The sale of an Andy Warhol painting of Mao Zedong at Phillips de Pury & Company in Manhattan totaled $79.9 million including fees, with record prices for works by some young, edgier artists.
abstract: Sale of Andy Warhol painting of Mao Zedong for $13.5 million tops contemporary art auction at Phillips de Pury & Company in Manhattan; auction brings in $79.9 million, closely following nearly $1 billion in sales of contemporary art at Sotheby's and Christie's auctions.
lead_paragraph: The sale of an Andy Warhol painting of Mao Zedong at Phillips de Pury & Company in Manhattan totaled $79.9 million including fees, with record prices for works by some young, edgier artists.

headline.seo: Warhol Painting of Mao Tops Auction at Phillips
headline.main: Warhol Painting of Mao Tops Auction at Phillips
headline.print_headline: Warhol Painting of Mao Tops Auction at Phillips
